content.prompt: The Soviet Second World War poster shown above gives which of the following messages?

choices.label: Soviet weapons are superior to German equipment.
Stalin has transformed the Soviet Union into a modem industrial state.
The Soviet army will spread the doctrines of Communism across Europe.
Soviet soldiers defend the Motherland like heroes from Russian history.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and describe a claim and/or argument in a text-based or non-text-based source.
